name: when-bots-take-over
description: *movie trailler voice* IN A WORLD...WHERE BOTS ARE TAKING OVET THE GALAXY... One man..One macbook.. and a bunch of code can save the universe. THis summer, jean claude van damn is...The programmer..Directed by Stanley Kurbrick's long lost son. Rated S
